reviewText: I have always loved to hear Charley Pride sing and to see him perform was frosting on the cake.  I am so glad I got the DVD, and I always keep it handy.  when they inducted him into the Country Music Hall of Fame, I Cried as hard as he dId.  I'd recommend either the CD or DVD to anyone. It's worth it.
This was an excellent rendition of Neil Sekada's best hits in the form of a public concert. I thoroughly enjoyed every minute of it!
